abstract: The multiyear agreement is a public olive branch after the two companies clashed during Comcast’s takeover attempt of Time Warner Cable.
snippet: The multiyear agreement is a public olive branch after the two companies clashed during Comcast’s takeover attempt of Time Warner Cable.
lead_paragraph: Comcast isn’t the big bad bully in media land anymore, at least according to the television group Discovery Communications.

headline.main: Comcast and Discovery Announce Long-Term Distribution Deal
